item.title: 英国智库称工作"不再是摆脱贫困的途径"
item.description: 根据决议基金会的研究，英国典型低收入家庭需要等待137年才能实现生活水平翻番——这一周期比过去延长了三倍以上。【原文：A typical lower-income British household would have to wait 137 years to see its living standards double, according to the Resolution Foundation — more than three times longer than in the past.】

item.title: 斯塔默正引领一场经济复苏，但他可能无缘享受其成果
item.description: 对首相基尔·斯塔默而言，眼下形势本该一片大好——年初时他还恳求不满的公众以他扭转英国经济的能力来评判自己。【原文：Things ought to be looking rosy for Prime Minister Keir Starmer, who began the year begging a dissatisfied public to judge him on his ability to turn around the UK economy.】

item.title: 马来西亚反贪污委员会主席在舆论哗然后重返股市
item.description: 马来西亚反贪污委员会主席阿扎姆·巴基持有某金融服务公司数百万股股份，公司文件显示。这是他数年前因持股问题引发轩然大波、抗议者要求其下台以来，首次公开披露其名下的大额股权。【原文：Malaysian anti-corruption chief Azam Baki held millions of shares in a financial-services company, a corporate filing shows, the first public disclosure of a major stake in his name since an uproar over his shareholdings several years ago spurred protests calling for him to step down.】

item.title: 新加坡预计2026年GDP增速可达4%，得益于全球经济强劲复苏
item.description: 新加坡预测今年经济增速将超预期，因全球贸易活动保持韧性。【原文：Singapore forecast its economy will expand faster than expected this year as global trade activity remains resilient.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉加大美元抛售力度以支撑玻利瓦尔汇率
item.description: 委内瑞拉临时政府正通过私营银行出售更多美元，作为在政治动荡中维持货币稳定的持续努力的一部分。【原文：Venezuela’s interim government is selling more dollars through private banks as part of an ongoing effort to keep the currency stable amid political uncertainty.】

item.title: 内存芯片短缺引发市场动荡，且影响将持续扩大
item.description: 过去几个月内存芯片价格的持续飙升，在股市中催生了赢家与输家的巨大鸿沟，而投资者们尚未看到这场涨势的终结迹象。【原文：The relentless surge in memory chip prices over the past few months has driven a vast divide between winners and losers in the stock market, and investors don’t see any end in sight.】

item.title: 金价回落，市场波动持续，此前经历历史性暴跌
item.description: 黄金在连续两日上涨后回落，投资者在震荡市场中获利了结。此前黄金遭遇历史性暴跌，市场仍在试图寻找底部支撑。【原文：Gold fell after two days of gains, as investors took profits in a choppy market that’s still trying to find a floor following a historic rout.】

item.title: 油价延续两日涨势，交易员聚焦中东风险
item.description: 油价延续两日涨势，因中东局势紧张——尤其是石油输出国组织成员国伊朗的动荡——为油价增添了风险溢价。【原文：Oil held a two-day advance as tensions in the Middle East centered on OPEC member Iran added a risk premium to prices.】

item.title: 澳大利亚消费者信心指数在澳联储加息后下滑
item.description: 澳大利亚消费者信心指数在2月份下滑，此前该国央行成为今年首个上调基准利率的主要货币当局，旨在抑制顽固的通胀。【原文：Australia’s consumer sentiment slipped in February after the Reserve Bank became the first major monetary authority to hike its key interest rate this year in an effort to tame stubbornly strong inflation.】

item.title: 米兰称美联储决策者应在危机中运用资产负债表
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬·米兰表示，央行资产负债表需要缩减规模，但这不应阻止决策者在经济危机期间选择大规模资产购买。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran said the central bank’s balance sheet needs to be smaller, but that shouldn’t preclude policymakers from opting for large-scale asset purchases during an economic crisis.】

item.title: 宝藏酒业股价因分销商和解协议大涨8%
item.description: 澳大利亚葡萄酒生产商Treasury Wines Estates Ltd.已与一家决定退出利润丰厚的加州市场的主要美国分销商达成和解，推动其股价创下16个月来最大涨幅。【原文：Australian vintner Treasury Wines Estates Ltd. has reached a settlement with a major US distributor that had decided to stop operating in the lucrative California market, pushing its shares up by the most in 16 months.】

item.title: 1.7万亿美元股市上涨未能消除"韩国折价"
item.description: 韩国股市在经历1.7万亿美元的上涨后，仍未能弥补其长期存在的折价现象。基金经理们表示，企业盈利增长为这一全球领先的涨势持续提供了支撑依据。【原文：South Korean stocks have yet to close their long-held discount against peers even after a $1.7 trillion rally, with earnings growth making a case for the world-beating advance to continue, money managers say.】

item.title: 日本债券市场暴跌，企业借款人转向可转换债券
item.description: 随着财政支出激增和央行加息的前景推高传统债务工具成本，日本企业正越来越多地转向可转换债券。【原文：Japanese companies are increasingly turning toward convertible bonds as the prospects of a surge in fiscal spending and central bank rate hikes raise the cost of traditional debt instruments.】

item.title: 英国加强安保措施，此前审查揭露预算违规规模
item.description: 英国财政部将加强未来财政活动的安保措施，以防止11月预算案中市场敏感文件提前泄露的史无前例事件重演，并遏制政府官员泄密行为。【原文：The UK Treasury will tighten up security around future fiscal events to prevent a repeat of the unprecedented early release of market-sensitive documents at the November budget and to stop leaks by government officials.】

item.title: 凯雷集团的柯里称石油、金属市场“投资不足”
item.description: 凯雷集团的杰夫·柯里表示，石油和金属市场存在"严重投资不足"现象，且具有显著上涨空间。他补充称，长期以来压制原油价格的供应过剩论调已被过度放大。【原文：Oil and metals markets are “substantially underinvested” and have significant upside, said Carlyle Group Inc.’s Jeff Currie, adding the longstanding oversupply narrative weighing down crude prices is overblown.】

item.title: 贝恩资本拟收购Coherent公司23亿美元股权
item.description: 据知情人士透露，贝恩资本以高达23亿美元的价格出售了Coherent Corp.的一批未注册股票，这是这家私募股权公司减持该激光设备制造商股份的最新举措。【原文：Bain Capital offered an unregistered block of Coherent Corp. shares for as much as $2.3 billion, according to people familiar with the matter, the latest selldown of the private equity firm’s stake in the laser equipment maker.】

item.title: 亚洲股市有望延续涨势再创纪录：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市周二蓄势再创新高，跟随美国科技股在人工智能驱动的暴跌后进一步反弹。【原文：Asian equities were primed for fresh highs Tuesday, tracking a further recovery in US tech stocks that followed an artificial intelligence-driven rout.】

item.title: 房地产债务"到期墙"压力缓解，8750亿美元债务即将到期
item.description: 随着美国商业房地产前景好转，不断累积的房地产债务压力终于开始缓解。【原文：A steadily building wall of maturing property debt in the US is finally letting up as the outlook for commercial real estate improves.】

item.title: 保险经纪公司股价暴跌，人工智能应用引发行业颠覆担忧
item.description: 美国保险经纪公司股票周一遭遇重挫，因私营在线保险购物平台Insurify推出的人工智能工具引发市场担忧，认为该行业可能面临颠覆性变革。【原文：US insurance broker stocks were pummeled Monday as the launch of an artificial intelligence tool from privately held online insurance shopping platform Insurify sparked fears about the industry facing disruption.】

item.title: 大通银行利润受大宗商品与资产管理业务提振
item.description: 麦格理集团第三季度利润得益于其大宗商品与全球市场部门的贡献，以及资产管理部门的强劲表现。【原文：Macquarie Group Ltd.’s third-quarter profit was supported by its commodities and global markets division as well as a strong performance in its asset management unit.】

item.title: RBC BlueBay警告称，人工智能债务浪潮需要3000亿美元的新资本
item.description: 据加拿大皇家银行全球资产管理公司预测，随着高评级债券净发行量预计将达到创纪录的1万亿美元，今年将需要更多投资者介入以消化新增的3000亿美元债务，否则美国公司债券市场恐将面临抛售风险。【原文：With high-grade net issuance expected to reach an unprecedented $1 trillion, more investors will need to step in to absorb an added $300 billion of new debt this year or risk a US corporate bond market selloff, according to RBC Global Asset Management.】

item.title: 英格兰银行的曼恩表示，由于美国关税，中国正在提高出口价格
item.description: 英国央行政策制定者凯瑟琳·曼恩表示，由于中国提高对英国出口商品的价格以弥补美国关税造成的损失，特朗普总统的贸易战正助推英国通胀。【原文：President Donald Trump’s trade wars are contributing to UK inflation as China raises prices on exports to Britain to recover the cost of US tariffs, Bank of England policymaker Catherine Mann said.】

item.title: 人工智能助诈骗中心逃避亚洲打击，骗取更多受害者
item.description: 国际刑警组织高级官员表示，东南亚犯罪分子正利用廉价的人工智能工具，以高速锁定更庞大的潜在受害者群体，使得诈骗中心即便在政府试图打击时仍持续运转。【原文：Criminals in Southeast Asia are harnessing inexpensive AI tools to target bigger pools of potential victims at high speed, keeping scam centers humming even as governments try and crack down, senior officials at Interpol say.】

item.title: 中国小马AI与丰田启动自动驾驶汽车量产模式
item.description: 中国自动驾驶出租车运营商小马智能（Pony AI Inc.）已与投资方丰田汽车公司（Toyota Motor Corp.）合作，启动无人驾驶车辆的商业化生产。【原文：Chinese robotaxi operator Pony AI Inc. has started commercial production of a driverless vehicle in partnership with Toyota Motor Corp., one of its backers.】

item.title: 加拿大银矿公司称墨西哥矿区被劫持员工已死亡
item.description: 加拿大维兹拉银业公司表示，上月在墨西哥旗舰项目帕努科遭绑架的数名员工家属已通知公司，这些工人已被发现死亡。【原文：Canada’s Vizsla Silver Corp. said the families of several employees who were taken from its flagship Panuco project in Mexico last month have informed the company that the workers had been found dead.】

item.title: 马克龙获得良机，开始让法国更具抵御勒庞的能力
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔·马克龙获得了一个绝佳机会，可以保护法国最重要的机构之一免受极右翼势力的侵蚀。【原文：President Emmanuel Macron has been handed a golden chance to insulate one of France’s most important institutions from the far right.】

item.title: 巴西着手禁止青少年接触网络赌博及色情内容
item.description: 巴西政府正着手制定法规，禁止青少年接触网络赌博、色情及类似内容，推进2025年批准的新限制措施。当前全球各国正考虑对儿童和青少年使用社交媒体实施更严格的管控。【原文：Brazil’s government is preparing rules banning youth access to gambling, pornography and similar content online, moving ahead with new restrictions approved in 2025 as nations across the world weigh stricter limits on social media for children and teens.】

item.title: 美联储委员沃勒称特朗普引发的加密货币狂热或将消退
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗·沃勒表示，在唐纳德·特朗普当选总统后提振加密货币市场的初期乐观情绪，如今可能正在消退，因为这场抛售已使该资产类别动荡不安。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said initial optimism that lifted crypto markets after President Donald Trump was elected may now be fading amid a selloff that has rattled the asset class.】

item.title: 花旗称沃什将面临缩减美联储资产组合的挑战
item.description: 花旗集团策略师表示，美联储主席提名人凯文·沃什很可能采取渐进方式缩减央行6.6万亿美元资产组合，以避免重燃货币市场紧张局势。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair nominee Kevin Warsh is likely to take a gradual approach to shrinking the central bank’s $6.6 trillion portfolio to avoid rekindling money market tensions, according to strategists at Citigroup Inc.】

item.title: 玻利维亚财政部长称将动用美元储备偿付债券
item.description: 玻利维亚财政部长在接受采访时表示，该国计划动用不断增长的外汇储备，以偿还即将到期的美元债券，这些债券的债权方为私营机构。此举旨在稳定国家经济。【原文：Bolivia plans to use its growing stockpile of international reserves to meet upcoming dollar-bond payments due to private creditors, the nation’s finance chief said in an interview as he works to steady the economy.】
